   19: -module(upgrade_SUITE).
   20: 
   21: %% Prior to OTP 26, maybe_expr used to require runtime support. As it's now
   22: %% enabled by default, all modules are tagged with the feature even when they
   23: %% don't use it. Therefore, we explicitly disable it until OTP 25 is out of
   24: %% support.
   25: -feature(maybe_expr, disable).
   26: -compile(r24).
   27: 
   28: -compile(export_all).
   29: 
   30: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   31: -include_lib("kernel/include/file.hrl").
   32: 
   33: -define(upgr_sname,otp_upgrade).
   34: 
   35: %% Applications that are excluded from this test because they cannot
   36: %% just be started in a new node with out specific configuration.
   37: -define(start_exclude,
   38: 	[cosEvent,cosEventDomain,cosFileTransfer,cosNotification,
   39: 	 cosProperty,cosTime,cosTransactions,erts,ic,netconf,orber,
   40: 	 safe,wx,observer,et,debugger,dialyzer]).
   41: 
   42: %% Applications that are excluded from this test because their appup
   43: %% file don't support the upgrade.
   44: %% In specific:
   45: %% - erl_interface, jinterface support no upgrade
   46: -define(appup_exclude, [erl_interface,jinterface]).
   47: 
   48: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   49:     %% Check that a real release is running, not e.g. cerl
   50:     ok = application:ensure_started(sasl),
   51:     case release_handler:which_releases() of
   52: 	[{_,_,[],_}] ->
   53: 	    %% Fake release, no applications
   54: 	    {skip, "Need a real release running to create other releases"};
   55: 	_ ->
   56: 	    rm_rf(filename:join([proplists:get_value(data_dir,Config),priv_dir])),
   57: 	    Config
   58:     end.
   59: 
   60: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   61:     %% This function is required since init_per_suite/1 exists.
   62:     ok.
   63: 
   64: init_per_testcase(Case,Config) ->
   65:     PrivDir = filename:join([proplists:get_value(data_dir,Config),priv_dir,Case]),
   66:     CreateDir = filename:join([PrivDir,create]),
   67:     InstallDir = filename:join([PrivDir,install]),
   68:     ok = filelib:ensure_dir(filename:join(CreateDir,"*")),
   69:     ok = filelib:ensure_dir(filename:join(InstallDir,"*")),
   70:     Config1 = lists:keyreplace(priv_dir,1,Config,{priv_dir,PrivDir}),
   71:     [{create_dir,CreateDir},{install_dir,InstallDir}|Config1].
   72: 
   73: end_per_testcase(_Case,Config) ->
   74:     Nodes = nodes(),
   75:     [test_server:stop_node(Node) || Node <- Nodes],
   76:     case proplists:get_value(tc_status,Config) of
   77: 	ok ->
   78: 	    %% Note that priv_dir here is per test case!
   79: 	    rm_rf(proplists:get_value(priv_dir,Config));
   80: 	_fail ->
   81: 	    %% Test case data can be found under DataDir/priv_dir/Case
   82: 	    ok
   83:     end,
   84:     ok.
   85: 
   86: all() ->
   87:     [minor,major,ancient_major].
   88: 
   89: %% If this is major release X, then this test performs an upgrade from
   90: %% major release X-1 to the current release.
   91: major(Config) ->
   92:     put(verbose, true),
   93:     p("major -> get current major release"),
   94:     Current = erlang:system_info(otp_release),
   95:     PreviousMajor = previous_major(Current),
   96:     upgrade_test(PreviousMajor,Current,Config).
   97: 
   98: %% If this is major release X, then this test performs an upgrade from
   99: %% major release X-2 to the current release.
  100: ancient_major(Config) ->
  101:     put(verbose, true),
  102:     p("ancient_major -> get current major release"),
  103:     Current = erlang:system_info(otp_release),
  104:     PreviousPreviousMajor = previous_major(previous_major(Current)),
  105:     upgrade_test(PreviousPreviousMajor,Current,Config).
  106: 
  107: %% If this is a patched version of major release X, then this test
  108: %% performs an upgrade from major release X to the current release.
  109: minor(Config) ->
  110:     put(verbose, true),
  111:     p("minor -> get current major release"),
  112:     CurrentMajor = erlang:system_info(otp_release),
  113:     Current = CurrentMajor++"_patched",
  114:     upgrade_test(CurrentMajor,Current,Config).
  115: 
  116: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  117: upgrade_test(FromVsn,ToVsn,Config) ->
  118:     p("upgrade_test -> entry with"
  119:       "~n      FromVsn: ~p"
  120:       "~n      ToVsn:   ~p"
  121:       "~n      Config:  ~p", [FromVsn, ToVsn, Config]),
  122:     OldRel =
  123: 	case test_server:is_release_available(FromVsn) of
  124: 	    true ->
  125: 		{release,FromVsn};
  126: 	    false ->
  127: 		case ct:get_config({otp_releases,list_to_atom(FromVsn)}) of
  128: 		    undefined ->
  129: 			false;
  130: 		    Prog0 ->
  131: 			case os:find_executable(Prog0) of
  132: 			    false ->
  133: 				false;
  134: 			    Prog ->
  135: 				{prog,Prog}
  136: 			end
  137: 		end
  138: 	end,
  139:     p("upgrade_test -> old release: "
  140:       "~n      ~p", [OldRel]),
  141:     case OldRel of
  142: 	false ->
  143: 	    %% Note that priv_dir here is per test case!
  144: 	    rm_rf(proplists:get_value(priv_dir,Config)),
  145: 	    {skip, "no previous release available"};
  146: 	_ ->
  147: 	    upgrade_test1(FromVsn,ToVsn,[{old_rel,OldRel}|Config])
  148:     end.
  149: 
  150: upgrade_test1(FromVsn,ToVsn,Config) ->
  151:     p("upgrade_test1 -> get create-dir"),
  152:     CreateDir = proplists:get_value(create_dir,Config),
  153:     p("upgrade_test1 -> get install-dir"),
  154:     InstallDir = proplists:get_value(install_dir,Config),
  155:     FromRelName = "otp-"++FromVsn,
  156:     ToRelName = "otp-"++ToVsn,
  157: 
  158:     {FromRel,FromApps} = target_system(FromRelName, FromVsn,
  159: 				       CreateDir, InstallDir,Config),
  160:     p("upgrade_test1 -> target system:"
  161:       "~n      FromRel:  ~p"
  162:       "~n      FromApps: ~p", [FromRel, FromApps]),
  163:     {ToRel,ToApps} = upgrade_system(FromVsn, FromRel, ToRelName, ToVsn,
  164: 				    CreateDir, InstallDir),
  165:     p("upgrade_test1 -> upgrade system:"
  166:       "~n      ToRel:  ~p"
  167:       "~n      ToApps: ~p", [ToRel, ToApps]),
  168:     do_upgrade(FromVsn, FromApps, ToRel, ToApps, InstallDir).
  169: 
  170: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  171: %%% This is similar to sasl/examples/src/target_system.erl, but with
  172: %%% the following adjustments:
  173: %%% - add a log directory
  174: %%% - use an own 'start' script
  175: %%% - chmod 'start' and 'start_erl'
  176: target_system(RelName0,RelVsn,CreateDir,InstallDir,Config) ->
  177:     p("target_system -> start worker node"),
  178:     {ok,Node} = test_server:start_node(list_to_atom(RelName0),peer,
  179: 				       [{erl,[proplists:get_value(old_rel,Config)]}]),
  180: 
  181:     p("target_system -> create relfile"),
  182:     {RelName,Apps,ErtsVsn} = create_relfile(Node,CreateDir,RelName0,RelVsn),
  183:  
  184:     %% Create .script and .boot
  185:     p("target_system -> create .script and .boot"),
  186:     ok = rpc:call(Node,systools,make_script,[RelName]),
  187:     
  188:     %% Create base tar file - i.e. erts and all apps
  189:     p("target_system -> create base tar file"),
  190:     ok = rpc:call(Node,systools,make_tar,
  191: 		  [RelName,[{erts,rpc:call(Node,code,root_dir,[])}]]),
  192:     
  193:     %% Unpack the tar to complete the installation
  194:     p("target_system -> unpack to complete installation"),
  195:     erl_tar:extract(RelName ++ ".tar.gz", [{cwd, InstallDir}, compressed]),
  196:     
  197:     %% Add bin and log dirs
  198:     p("target_system -> add bin and log dirs"),
  199:     BinDir = filename:join([InstallDir, "bin"]),
  200:     file:make_dir(BinDir),
  201:     file:make_dir(filename:join(InstallDir,"log")),
  202: 
  203:     %% Delete start scripts - they will be added later
  204:     p("target_system -> delete start scripts"),
  205:     ErtsBinDir = filename:join([InstallDir, "erts-" ++ ErtsVsn, "bin"]),
  206:     file:delete(filename:join([ErtsBinDir, "erl"])),
  207:     file:delete(filename:join([ErtsBinDir, "start"])),
  208:     file:delete(filename:join([ErtsBinDir, "start_erl"])),
  209:     
  210:     %% Copy .boot to bin/start.boot
  211:     p("target_system -> copy .boot and bin/start.boot"),
  212:     copy_file(RelName++".boot",filename:join([BinDir, "start.boot"])),
  213:     
  214:     %% Copy scripts from erts-xxx/bin to bin
  215:     p("target_system -> copy scripts from erts-xxx/bin to bin"),
  216:     copy_file(filename:join([ErtsBinDir, "epmd"]), 
  217:               filename:join([BinDir, "epmd"]), [preserve]),
  218:     copy_file(filename:join([ErtsBinDir, "run_erl"]), 
  219:               filename:join([BinDir, "run_erl"]), [preserve]),
  220:     copy_file(filename:join([ErtsBinDir, "to_erl"]), 
  221:               filename:join([BinDir, "to_erl"]), [preserve]),
  222:     
  223:     %% create start_erl.data and sys.config
  224:     p("target_system -> create start_erl.data and sys.config"),
  225:     StartErlData = filename:join([InstallDir, "releases", "start_erl.data"]),
  226:     write_file(StartErlData, io_lib:fwrite("~s ~s~n", [ErtsVsn, RelVsn])),
  227:     SysConfig = filename:join([InstallDir, "releases", RelVsn, "sys.config"]),
  228:     write_file(SysConfig, "[]."),
  229:     
  230:     %% Insert 'start' script from data_dir - modified to add sname and heart
  231:     p("target_system -> insert 'start' script from data-dir"),
  232:     copy_file(filename:join(proplists:get_value(data_dir,Config),"start.src"),
  233: 	      filename:join(ErtsBinDir,"start.src")),
  234:     ok = file:change_mode(filename:join(ErtsBinDir,"start.src"),8#0755),
  235: 
  236:     %% Make start_erl executable
  237:     %% (this has been fixed in OTP 17 - is is now installed with
  238:     %% $INSTALL_SCRIPT instead of $INSTALL_DATA and should therefore
  239:     %% be executable from the start)
  240:     p("target_system -> make start_erl executable"),
  241:     ok = file:change_mode(filename:join(ErtsBinDir,"start_erl.src"),8#0755),
  242: 
  243:     %% Substitute variables in erl.src, start.src and start_erl.src
  244:     %% (.src found in erts-xxx/bin - result stored in bin)
  245:     p("target_system -> substitute variables"),
  246:     subst_src_scripts(["erl", "start", "start_erl"], ErtsBinDir, BinDir, 
  247:                       [{"FINAL_ROOTDIR", InstallDir}, {"EMU", "beam"}],
  248:                       [preserve]),
  249: 
  250:     %% Create RELEASES
  251:     p("target_system -> create releases"),
  252:     RelFile = filename:join([InstallDir, "releases", 
  253: 			     filename:basename(RelName) ++ ".rel"]),
  254:     release_handler:create_RELEASES(InstallDir, RelFile),
  255: 
  256:     p("target_system -> stop worker node"),
  257:     true = test_server:stop_node(Node),
  258: 
  259:     p("target_system -> done"),
  260:     {RelName,Apps}.
  261: 
  262: 
  263: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  264: %%% Create a release containing the current (the test node) OTP
  265: %%% release, including relup to allow upgrade from an earlier OTP
  266: %%% release.
  267: upgrade_system(FromVsn, FromRel, ToRelName0, ToVsn,
  268: 	       CreateDir, InstallDir) ->
  269: 
  270:     p("upgrade_system -> create relfile"),
  271:     {RelName,Apps,_} = create_relfile(node(),CreateDir,ToRelName0,ToVsn),
  272:     FromPath = filename:join([InstallDir,lib,"*",ebin]),
  273: 
  274:     p("upgrade_system -> make script"),
  275:     ok = systools:make_script(RelName),
  276:     p("upgrade_system -> make relup"),
  277:     ok = systools:make_relup(RelName,[FromRel],[FromRel],
  278: 			     [{path,[FromPath]},
  279: 			      {outdir,CreateDir}]),
  280: 
  281:     case {FromVsn,ToVsn} of
  282:         {"20"++_,"21"++_} ->
  283:             p("upgrade_system -> try fix relup (with regards to inets ftp)"),
  284:             fix_relup_inets_ftp(filename:dirname(RelName));
  285:         _ -> ok
  286:     end,
  287: 
  288:     p("upgrade_system -> write system conf file"),
  289:     SysConfig = filename:join([CreateDir, "sys.config"]),
  290:     write_file(SysConfig, "[]."),
  291: 
  292:     p("upgrade_system -> make tar"),
  293:     ok = systools:make_tar(RelName,[{erts,code:root_dir()}]),
  294: 
  295:     p("upgrade_system -> done"),
  296:     {RelName,Apps}.
  297: 
  298: %% In OTP-21, ftp and tftp were split out from inets and formed two
  299: %% new separate applications. When creating the relup, systools
  300: %% automatically adds new applications first, before upgrading
  301: %% existing applications. Since ftp and tftp have processes with the
  302: %% same name as in the old version of inets, the upgrade failed with
  303: %% trying to start the new applications (already exist).
  304: %%
  305: %% To go around this problem, this function adds an instruction to
  306: %% stop inets before the new applications are started. This is a very
  307: %% specific adjustment, and it will be needed for any upgrade which
  308: %% involves conversion from inets to ftp/tftp.
  309: fix_relup_inets_ftp(Dir) ->
  310:     Filename = filename:join(Dir,"relup"),
  311:     {ok,[{ToVsn,Up,Down}]} = file:consult(Filename),
  312:     [{FromVsn,UpDescr,UpInstr}] = Up,
  313:     [{FromVsn,DownDescr,DownInstr}] = Down,
  314: 
  315:     Fun = fun(point_of_no_return) -> false;
  316:              (_) -> true
  317:           end,
  318:     {UpBefore,[point_of_no_return|UpAfter]} = lists:splitwith(Fun,UpInstr),
  319:     {DownBefore,[point_of_no_return|DownAfter]} = lists:splitwith(Fun,DownInstr),
  320:     NewRelup =
  321:         {ToVsn,
  322:          [{FromVsn,UpDescr,UpBefore++[point_of_no_return,
  323:                                       {apply,{application,stop,[inets]}} |
  324:                                       UpAfter]}],
  325:          [{FromVsn,DownDescr,DownBefore++[point_of_no_return,
  326:                                           {apply,{application,stop,[inets]}} |
  327:                                           DownAfter]}]},
  328:     {ok, Fd} = file:open(Filename, [write,{encoding,utf8}]),
  329:     io:format(Fd, "%% ~s~n~tp.~n", [epp:encoding_to_string(utf8),NewRelup]),
  330:     ok = file:close(Fd).
  331: 
  332: 
  333: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  334: %%% Start a new node running the release from target_system/5
  335: %%% above. Then upgrade to the system from upgrade_system/5.
  336: do_upgrade(FromVsn,FromApps,ToRel,ToApps,InstallDir) ->
  337: 
  338:     p("do_upgrade -> entry with"
  339:       "~n      FromVsn:    ~p"
  340:       "~n      FromApps:   ~p"
  341:       "~n      ToRel:      ~p"
  342:       "~n      ToApps:     ~p"
  343:       "~n      InstallDir: ~p",
  344:       [FromVsn, FromApps, ToRel, ToApps, InstallDir]),
  345: 
  346:     Start = filename:join([InstallDir,bin,start]),
  347:     p("do_upgrade -> start (worker from-) node"),
  348:     {ok,Node} = start_node(Start,permanent,FromVsn,FromApps),
  349: 
  350:     p("do_upgrade -> verify (from-) release (permanent)"),
  351:     [{"OTP upgrade test",FromVsn,_,permanent}] =
  352: 	rpc:call(Node,release_handler,which_releases,[]),
  353:     ToRelName = filename:basename(ToRel),
  354:     p("do_upgrade -> copy (to-) release"),
  355:     copy_file(ToRel++".tar.gz",
  356: 	      filename:join([InstallDir,releases,ToRelName++".tar.gz"])),
  357:     p("do_upgrade -> unpack (to-) release"),
  358:     {ok,ToVsn} = rpc:call(Node,release_handler,unpack_release,[ToRelName]),
  359:     p("do_upgrade -> verify release(s) (unpacked,permanent)"),
  360:     [{"OTP upgrade test",ToVsn,_,unpacked},
  361:      {"OTP upgrade test",FromVsn,_,permanent}] =
  362: 	rpc:call(Node,release_handler,which_releases,[]),
  363:     p("do_upgrade -> install (to-) release"),
  364:     case rpc:call(Node,release_handler,install_release,[ToVsn]) of
  365: 	{ok,FromVsn,_} ->
  366: 	    ok;
  367: 	{continue_after_restart,FromVsn,_} ->
  368: 	    wait_node_up(current,ToVsn,ToApps)
  369:     end,
  370:     p("do_upgrade -> verify release(s) (current,permanent)"),
  371:     [{"OTP upgrade test",ToVsn,_,current},
  372:      {"OTP upgrade test",FromVsn,_,permanent}] =
  373: 	rpc:call(Node,release_handler,which_releases,[]),
  374:     p("do_upgrade -> make (to-) permanent"),
  375:     ok = rpc:call(Node,release_handler,make_permanent,[ToVsn]),
  376:     p("do_upgrade -> verify release(s) (permanent,old)"),
  377:     [{"OTP upgrade test",ToVsn,_,permanent},
  378:      {"OTP upgrade test",FromVsn,_,old}] =
  379: 	rpc:call(Node,release_handler,which_releases,[]),
  380:     
  381:     p("do_upgrade -> stop (worker) node"),
  382:     erlang:monitor_node(Node,true),
  383:     _ = rpc:call(Node,init,stop,[]),
  384:     receive {nodedown,Node} -> ok end,
  385: 
  386:     p("do_upgrade -> done"),
  387:     ok.
  388: 
  389: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  390: %%% Library functions
  391: previous_major("17") ->
  392:     "r16b";
  393: previous_major(Rel) ->
  394:     integer_to_list(list_to_integer(Rel)-1).
  395: 
  396: create_relfile(Node,CreateDir,RelName0,RelVsn) ->
  397:     LibDir = rpc:call(Node,code,lib_dir,[]),
  398:     SplitLibDir = filename:split(LibDir),
  399:     Paths = rpc:call(Node,code,get_path,[]),
  400:     Exclude = ?start_exclude ++ ?appup_exclude,
  401:     Apps = lists:flatmap(
  402: 	     fun(Path) ->
  403: 		     case lists:prefix(LibDir,Path) of
  404: 			 true ->
  405: 			     case filename:split(Path) -- SplitLibDir of
  406: 				 [AppVsn,"ebin"] ->
  407: 				     case string:lexemes(AppVsn,"-") of
  408: 					 [AppStr,Vsn] ->
  409: 					     App = list_to_atom(AppStr),
  410: 					     case lists:member(App,Exclude) of
  411: 						 true ->
  412: 						     [];
  413: 						 false ->
  414: 						     [{App,Vsn,restart_type(App)}]
  415: 					     end;
  416: 					 _ ->
  417: 					     []
  418: 				     end;
  419: 				 _ ->
  420: 				     []
  421: 			     end;
  422: 			 false ->
  423: 			     []
  424: 		     end
  425: 	     end,
  426: 	     Paths),
  427: 
  428:     ErtsVsn = rpc:call(Node, erlang, system_info, [version]),
  429:     
  430:     %% Create the .rel file
  431:     RelContent = {release, {"OTP upgrade test", RelVsn}, {erts, ErtsVsn}, Apps},
  432:     RelName = filename:join(CreateDir,RelName0),
  433:     RelFile = RelName++".rel",
  434:     {ok,Fd} = file:open(RelFile,[write,{encoding,utf8}]),
  435:     io:format(Fd,"~tp.~n",[RelContent]),
  436:     ok = file:close(Fd),
  437:     {RelName,Apps,ErtsVsn}.
  438: 
  439: restart_type(App) when App==kernel; App==stdlib; App==sasl ->
  440:     permanent;
  441: restart_type(_) ->
  442:     temporary.
  443: 
  444: copy_file(Src, Dest) ->
  445:     copy_file(Src, Dest, []).
  446: 
  447: copy_file(Src, Dest, Opts) ->
  448:     {ok,_} = file:copy(Src, Dest),
  449:     case lists:member(preserve, Opts) of
  450:         true ->
  451:             {ok, FileInfo} = file:read_file_info(Src),
  452:             file:write_file_info(Dest, FileInfo);
  453:         false ->
  454:             ok
  455:     end.
  456: 
  457: 
  458: write_file(FName, Conts) ->
  459:     Enc = file:native_name_encoding(),
  460:     {ok, Fd} = file:open(FName, [write]),
  461:     file:write(Fd, unicode:characters_to_binary(Conts,Enc,Enc)),
  462:     file:close(Fd).
  463: 
  464: 
  465: subst_src_scripts(Scripts, SrcDir, DestDir, Vars, Opts) -> 
  466:     lists:foreach(fun(Script) ->
  467:                           subst_src_script(Script, SrcDir, DestDir, 
  468:                                            Vars, Opts)
  469:                   end, Scripts).
  470: 
  471: subst_src_script(Script, SrcDir, DestDir, Vars, Opts) -> 
  472:     subst_file(filename:join([SrcDir, Script ++ ".src"]),
  473:                filename:join([DestDir, Script]),
  474:                Vars, Opts).
  475: 
  476: subst_file(Src, Dest, Vars, Opts) ->
  477:     {ok, Bin} = file:read_file(Src),
  478:     Conts = binary_to_list(Bin),
  479:     NConts = subst(Conts, Vars),
  480:     write_file(Dest, NConts),
  481:     case lists:member(preserve, Opts) of
  482:         true ->
  483:             {ok, FileInfo} = file:read_file_info(Src),
  484:             file:write_file_info(Dest, FileInfo);
  485:         false ->
  486:             ok
  487:     end.
  488: 
  489: %% subst(Str, Vars)
  490: %% Vars = [{Var, Val}]
  491: %% Var = Val = string()
  492: %% Substitute all occurrences of %Var% for Val in Str, using the list
  493: %% of variables in Vars.
  494: %%
  495: subst(Str, Vars) ->
  496:     subst(Str, Vars, []).
  497: 
  498: subst([$%, C| Rest], Vars, Result) when $A =< C, C =< $Z ->
  499:     subst_var([C| Rest], Vars, Result, []);
  500: subst([$%, C| Rest], Vars, Result) when $a =< C, C =< $z ->
  501:     subst_var([C| Rest], Vars, Result, []);
  502: subst([$%, C| Rest], Vars, Result) when  C == $_ ->
  503:     subst_var([C| Rest], Vars, Result, []);
  504: subst([C| Rest], Vars, Result) ->
  505:     subst(Rest, Vars, [C| Result]);
  506: subst([], _Vars, Result) ->
  507:     lists:reverse(Result).
  508: 
  509: subst_var([$%| Rest], Vars, Result, VarAcc) ->
  510:     Key = lists:reverse(VarAcc),
  511:     case lists:keysearch(Key, 1, Vars) of
  512:         {value, {Key, Value}} ->
  513:             subst(Rest, Vars, lists:reverse(Value, Result));
  514:         false ->
  515:             subst(Rest, Vars, [$%| VarAcc ++ [$%| Result]])
  516:     end;
  517: subst_var([C| Rest], Vars, Result, VarAcc) ->
  518:     subst_var(Rest, Vars, Result, [C| VarAcc]);
  519: subst_var([], Vars, Result, VarAcc) ->
  520:     subst([], Vars, [VarAcc ++ [$%| Result]]).
  521: 
  522: 
  523: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  524: %%% 
  525: start_node(Start,ExpStatus,ExpVsn,ExpApps) ->
  526:     case open_port({spawn_executable, Start}, [{env,[{"ERL_AFLAGS",false}]}]) of
  527:         Port when is_port(Port) ->
  528:             unlink(Port),
  529:             erlang:port_close(Port),
  530: 	    wait_node_up(ExpStatus, ExpVsn, ExpApps);
  531:         Error ->
  532:             Error
  533:     end.
  534: 
  535: wait_node_up(ExpStatus, ExpVsn, ExpApps0) ->
  536:     ExpApps = [{A,V} || {A,V,_T} <- ExpApps0],
  537:     Node    = node_name(?upgr_sname),
  538:     wait_node_up(Node, ExpStatus, ExpVsn, lists:keysort(1,ExpApps), 60).
  539: 
  540: wait_node_up(Node, ExpStatus, ExpVsn, ExpApps, 0) ->
  541:     LogTxt =
  542:         try erpc:call(Node, code, root_dir, []) of
  543:             Root ->
  544:                 LogGlob = filename:join([Root,"log","erlang.*"]),
  545:                 {ok, Log} = case filelib:wildcard(LogGlob) of
  546:                                 [Logfile|_] ->
  547:                                     file:read_file(Logfile);
  548:                                 [] ->
  549:                                     {ok, "No log file found"}
  550:                             end,
  551:                 Log
  552:         catch C:E ->
  553:                 {"erpc:call",C,E}
  554:         end,
  555:     p("wait_node_up -> fail~n"
  556:       "Logs: ~n~ts~n", [LogTxt]),
  557:     ct:fail({app_check_failed,ExpVsn,ExpApps,
  558: 	     rpc:call(Node, release_handler, which_releases,     [ExpStatus]),
  559: 	     rpc:call(Node, application,     which_applications, [])});
  560: wait_node_up(Node, ExpStatus, ExpVsn, ExpApps, N) ->
  561:     timer:sleep(2000),
  562:     p("wait_node_up -> [~w] get release vsn and apps", [N]),
  563:     case {rpc:call(Node, release_handler, which_releases,     [ExpStatus]),
  564:           rpc:call(Node, application,     which_applications, [])} of
  565:         {[{_,ExpVsn,_,_}],Apps} when is_list(Apps) ->
  566:             p("wait_node_up -> [~w] expected release vsn - check apps", [N]),
  567:             case [{A,V} || {A,_,V} <- lists:keysort(1,Apps)] of
  568:                 ExpApps ->
  569:                     p("wait_node_up -> [~w] expected apps", [N]),
  570:                     {ok, Node};
  571:                 UnexpApps ->
  572:                     p("wait_node_up -> [~w] still wrong apps:~n"
  573:                       "Missing:~p~n"
  574:                       "Extra:  ~p~n"
  575:                       "All:    ~p~n"
  576:                       , [N, ExpApps -- UnexpApps, UnexpApps -- ExpApps, UnexpApps]),
  577:                     wait_node_up(Node, ExpStatus, ExpVsn, ExpApps, N-1)
  578:             end;
  579:         {[{_,Vsn,_,_}],_} ->
  580:             p("wait_node_up -> [~w] still wrong release vsn:"
  581:               "~n      ~p", [N, Vsn]),
  582:             wait_node_up(Node, ExpStatus, ExpVsn, ExpApps, N-1);
  583:         X ->
  584:             p("wait_node_up -> [~w] unexpected results:"
  585:               "~n      ~p", [N, X]),
  586:             wait_node_up(Node, ExpStatus, ExpVsn, ExpApps, N-1)
  587:     end.
  588: 
  589: node_name(Sname) ->
  590:     {ok,Host} = inet:gethostname(),
  591:     list_to_atom(atom_to_list(Sname) ++ "@" ++ Host).
  592: 
  593: rm_rf(Dir) ->
  594:     case file:read_file_info(Dir) of
  595: 	{ok, #file_info{type = directory}} ->
  596: 	    {ok, Content} = file:list_dir_all(Dir),
  597: 	    [rm_rf(filename:join(Dir,C)) || C <- Content],
  598: 	    ok=file:del_dir(Dir),
  599: 	    ok;
  600: 	{ok, #file_info{}} ->
  601: 	    ok=file:delete(Dir);
  602: 	_ ->
  603: 	    ok
  604:     end. 
  605: 
  606: 
  607: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  608: %%% 
  609: 
  610: p(F) ->
  611:     p(F, []).
  612: 
  613: p(F, A) ->
  614:     p(get(verbose), F, A).
  615: 
  616: p(true, F, A) ->
  617:     print(F, A);
  618: p(_, _, _) ->
  619:     ok.
  620: 
  621: print(F, A) ->
  622:     ct:pal(F ++ "~n", A).
  623:
